sentence: the user selects the options with text {string} from the {string} dropdown
description: selects multiple options from a dropdown by their text.

variables.name: options
variables.description: Comma-separated list of option texts to select.

variables.name: name
variables.description: The logical name of the dropdown.

gherkinExample: When the user selects the options with text "Konoha,Hidden Leaf Village" from the "Country" dropdown
